title: Is the Courtyard by Marriott hotel still planned for downtown Wilmington, or is it a victim of the economic downturn?
text:
It appears that deal collapsed in 2007. Here's a link to a story at
StarNewsOnline.com with details:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100914/ARTICLES/100919809?p=all&tc=pgall
